channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Sosandar Fashion
channel.desc: Unveil your chic side with Sosandar! Discover flattering, trendy designs created for real life with longer lengths and unique styles to make you feel sexy, feminine, and confident.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Izabel London Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion from Izabel London. This inclusive brand caters to sizes 8 - 26 and features designs for the trend-conscious fashion fan shopping for everything from everyday style to holiday looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Lara Pearls Collection
channel.desc: Harness the beauty of pearls with the Lara Pearls Collection, offering stunning jewellery set with elegant pearls for over 20 years. Discover a piece for your jewellery box or a loved one's today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Seasonal Deals
channel.desc: Refresh your wardrobe with Ruth Langsford Seasonal Deals. Explore a hand-picked selection of stylish essentials, cosy layers and versatile pieces, all at fantastic prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Seasonal Deals
channel.desc: Refresh your wardrobe with Ruth Langsford Seasonal Deals. Explore a hand-picked selection of stylish essentials, cosy layers and versatile pieces, all at fantastic prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Vionic Footwear
channel.desc: A fashionable and comfortable footwear range with biomechanically-designed orthotic technology, which helps restore natural foot function and promote well-being with every step.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: White Stuff
channel.desc: Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nina Leonard
channel.desc: A collection of beautifully designed and elegant knitwear dresses, skirts and sweaters with co-ordinated accessories.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: New Season Footwear
channel.desc: Discover the latest trends in footwear this season with our range of transitional styles. Keep your best foot forward, and never compromise on style and comfort.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nightwear Edit
channel.desc: Update your nightwear collection with our fabulous selection of comfy pyjamas, snuggly robes and soft, stylish nightdresses. You'll be all set for snooze time.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Sosandar Fashion
channel.desc: Unveil your chic side with Sosandar! Discover flattering, trendy designs created for real life with longer lengths and unique styles to make you feel sexy, feminine, and confident.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Izabel London Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion from Izabel London. This inclusive brand caters to sizes 8 - 26 and features designs for the trend-conscious fashion fan shopping for everything from everyday style to holiday looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Malissa J Collection
channel.desc: Discover the Malissa J Collection and indulge in fashion and accessories that boast the latest trends, exceptional quality, and chic, versatile day-to-night designs offered at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: YAS Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in and discover YAS, a contemporary fashion brand who create for those who love fashion and freedom of expression. Enhance your wardrobe with their beautifully crafted designs.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co Seasonal Deals
channel.desc: QVC Selection.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: JDY Fashion
channel.desc: Go on, give your wardrobe a refresh with our stylish selection from JDY, a fashion brand dedicated to creating pieces that showcase your individuality.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories Gift Hall
channel.desc: Find the perfect gift with fashion accessories by some of our most sought-after brands. From chic purses and wallets to cosy PJs and slippers, there's something for everyone.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Outerwear Shop
channel.desc: Wrap up warm with some of the most popular items selected from across QVC's fashion ranges.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion to flatter your shape with Dannii Minogue's beautiful range of on-trend styles, which offers a full spectrum of petite and regular sizes designed to help you find your perfect fit.

channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nightwear Edit
channel.desc: Update your nightwear collection with our fabulous selection of comfy pyjamas, snuggly robes and soft, stylish nightdresses. You'll be all set for snooze time.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Frank Usher
channel.desc: Discover elegant clothing and accessories from Frank Usher. Designed for the modern woman, these beautiful designs will add a touch of sparkle and glamour to your wardrobe with comfort in mind.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: ONLY Fashion, JDY
channel.desc: Find clothing for all ages and sizes that allow you to express your own style. This is trendy yet easy-to-wear fashion from ONLY and JDY, two collections that work as well together as they do apart.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Winter Boots on 4 Pay
channel.desc: Winter Boots on 4 Pay.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen
channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: ONLY Fashion, JDY
channel.desc: Find clothing for all ages and sizes that allow you to express your own style. This is trendy yet easy-to-wear fashion from ONLY and JDY, two collections that work as well together as they do apart.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Winter Boots
channel.desc: Give your winter wardrobe a new lease of life with our great selection of stylish boots. Find a great pair to complement any outfit throughout the season, from all of the brands you know and love.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Helene Berman London
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe with classic, feminine fashion and accessories designs from Helene Berman.

channel.title: Monsoon

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonique Gifts
channel.desc: Diamonique is the finest simulated diamond in the world. In this show we present a range of rings, earrings and pendants to help you find the perfect present for a loved one - or a treat for yourself.
